title: Shortcut Tzatziki
description: Quick and easy Greek cucumber yogurt sauce, perfect for dipping and spreading
ingredients: 1 cup Greek yogurt (2% or full-fat for creaminess)
½ cucumber, grated (no need to peel if English cucumber)
1 small garlic clove, grated or minced
1 tbsp lemon juice (or white wine vinegar in a pinch)
1 tsp dried dill or 1 tbsp fresh dill, chopped (optional but nice)
instructions: Grate cucumber on the large side of a box grater. Quick squeeze in your hand or press in paper towel to remove most of the water (don't worry about it being bone-dry).
Mix cucumber into yogurt with garlic, lemon, olive oil, dill, salt, and pepper.
Stir, taste, and adjust: more lemon for tang, more garlic for punch.
notes: Makes about 1 cup. Keeps in fridge for 2–3 days.
